name: youtube-downloader-server
description: Backend server for YouTube video downloader

scripts.install-ytdlp: node -e "const {YtDlp} = require('ytdlp-nodejs'); const ytdlp = new YtDlp(); ytdlp.checkInstallationAsync().then(() => console.log('yt-dlp binary installed successfully')).catch(e => { console.error('yt-dlp install error:', e.message); process.exit(1); })"
